message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you a decent amount to keep the game interesting.
You're being too generous, let's be realistic about the value of the money!
You're being a bit too greedy, let's meet in the middle and make a fair deal.
You're still being too soft on me, I'm willing to make a more aggressive offer
I'm not getting any softer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers.
